channel.title: How do I remove quests?!?!# OMG
channel.description: Hey guys I just need a little help on how to remove quests. cause they are really bugging me

item.title: How do I remove quests?!?!# OMG
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

[quote=“lord killord, post:2, topic:332782”]if u dont want people having to do the quest then you can add in this command:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("quests") && playerRights >= 0) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { q1 = 15; q2 = 15; q3 = 15; q4 = 15; q5 = 15; q6 = 15; q7 = 15; q8 = 15; q9 = 15; q10 = 15; } }[/quote]

You should help him understand or he will come back tommorow with same question… (He might do it anyway but :P)

Read full topic
item.source: How do I remove quests?!?!# OMG

item.title: How do I remove quests?!?!# OMG
item.dc:creator: @lord_killord lord killord
item.description:
@lord_killord wrote:

if u dont want people having to do the quest then you can add in this command:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("quests") && playerRights >= 0) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { q1 = 15; q2 = 15; q3 = 15; q4 = 15; q5 = 15; q6 = 15; q7 = 15; q8 = 15; q9 = 15; q10 = 15; } }
